review: good and easy to use, but not much things to do...needs to improve apps supports
author: Igor Bretas

review: Very difficult to sync with smart tv.  Especially one that is programmed with a universal remote.
author: John T. Noto

review: Didn't last 6 months.  Didn't work with Hulu Plus well at all
author: Cheri Slider

review: Finally! A way to watch Hulu, Netflix, Crunchyroll, Youtube, AND Google Play in one place! Set up was actually easier than I was expecting. If a future version appears, a WPS button would be nice.
author: Steve

review: i can watch youtube on tv anytime now, really easy
author: Sern How Ho

review: Fun and very easy to use and great usefulness to me is always amazing Google technology
author: hilal ali

review: Amazing. Couldn't ask for anything better
author: Joshua Powels

review: I use this daily with my MacBook, iPad, android phone, or on friends phones when they come over and want to pick the movie. Breezy setup, great connectivity, works even on my crappy 5g high-speed phone internet. Apps are of course better supported than tabbed casting but still great experience, especially for the price!
author: Stephanie

review: This thing is fantastic. I'm no techy but even I had an easy time setting this up and working it. Screw you cable company!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
author: Nowayjose "dl"
